name: data-connector-dashboard
description: This repository demonstrates export requests, jobs, data list and use the data to render some dashboards.

APS_CLIENT_ID.description: APS Client ID. Ensure this ID also provisions with BIM 360 account

APS_CALLBACK_URL.description: Callback URL of your APS app, required for 3-legged OAuth

DC_CALLBACK_URL.description: Callback URL of your app to get notification of Data Connector job
